name: Jungle Combat Amphitheatre
description:
"Jungle Combat Amphitheatre " a fighting game where you take control of a single unit, try beating all incoming enemies and clearing 10 levels.

INSPIRATION

Inspiration for the game taken from classic arcade games, where difficulty bar is high and mistakes hurt, making this game semi hard on 'easy' settings and really hard on 'hard' settings.

FEATURES

Game features 10 stages for player to complete, 5 items to enhance combat experience, fluid difficulty setting, option to change player unit appearance to your liking, and from 1 to dozens of hours of playtime depending on difficulty.

JCA has few simple mechanics and relatively constrainless controls to allow player execute various creative moves within given spectrum of actions.

PROJECT "CG7D"

"Jungle Combat Amphitheatre" is a product of a project - "Create a game in 7 days" (CG7D), which required developer to create a playable game within 7 days, starting on Monday and finishing on Sunday, plus extra time for polish.
